title: Diploma in Microsoft Office Access 2013 Intermediate
headline: Learn Microsoft Office Access 2013 with this free online course.
description: This free online course Microsoft Office Access 2013 Intermediate, teaches students about designing a relational database. The course then teaches students about joining tables and organizing a database for efficiency, Students will learn about sharing data across applications. The course wraps up with advanced reporting. "So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about Microsoft Office Access 2013.
courseDescription:
This course, Microsoft Office Access 2013 Intermediate, will provide you with an understanding of intermediate level skills used in the 2013 version of Microsoft Office Access. You will learn about designing a relational database. You will be able to explain table creation and relational DB design process analysis. You will also learn about creating table relationships. You will also learn about joining tables. Students will learn about relating data and self joins. The course will also teach you about creating subqueries.

This course then explains Organizing a database for efficiency . You will learn about data normalization and table analyzer wizard. You will also learn about creating a junction table and many-to-many relationship.

This course then wraps up with sharing data across applications like Microsoft Excel. The course teaches you how to create a mail merge and merging access data with a word document You will learn Advanced Reporting. You will learn how to format a report and add a sub-report to an existing report. By taking this course you will learn the intermediate skills of Microsoft Office 2013. So why wait? Start learning today.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
